ci_support_linux_64_python3.11.____cpyth:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.11.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version

about.summary: A comprehensive library for computational molecular biology

name: biotite

about.summary: A comprehensive library for computational molecular biology
A comprehensive library for computational molecular biology

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  version: 1.6.0

package:
  name: biotite
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  - url: https://github.com/biotite-dev/biotite/archive/v${{ version }}.tar.gz
    sha256: 945d91d984a995a14e93cfb751521bedfc6e68d9b2ca3e86fd67b6ddd1553cee
  - url: https://github.com/biotite-dev/biotite/releases/download/v${{ version }}/components.bcif
    sha256: dffdb3a19600d51854058daecfbc9bd1b94aab413a04e7afed8d4b7670621d47
    target_directory: src/biotite/structure/info/

build:
  number: 0
  skip:
    - match(python, "<3.11")
  script:
    env:
      SETUPTOOLS_SCM_PRETEND_VERSION: ${{ version }}
    content:
      - ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation

requirements:
  build:
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - python
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - cython
        - numpy >=2.0,<2.4
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - hatchling
    - hatch-vcs
    - hatch-cython
    - wheel >=0.30
    - cython >=3.0
    - numpy >=2.0,<2.4
  run:
    - python
    - biotraj >=1.0,<2.0
    - requests >=2.12
    - numpy >=1.26,<2.4
    - msgpack-python
    - networkx >=2.0

tests:
  - files:
      source:
        - tests/
    requirements:
      run:
        - pytest
    script:
      # Current failing tests in aarch64
      # See e.g., https://dev.azure.com/conda-forge/feedstock-builds/_build/results?buildId=1428046&view=logs&j=5b44946f-b0b5-570f-e735-950feabb4722&t=d53332be-ec07-565d-9b53-75513afd6eda
      # - pytest tests//structure//test_box.py::test_remove_pbc_restore  # Fails only for multi_model=True
      # - pytest tests//structure//test_rdf.py::test_rdf_normalized
      # But these work in native ARM, so we suspect this is a glitch of QEMU emulation
      #   https://github.com/conda-forge/biotite-feedstock/pull/81#issuecomment-3711328024
      # Deactivate tests failing for the time being
      - if: aarch64
        then: pytest tests//structure tests//sequence -k "not test_remove_pbc_restore and not test_rdf_normalized"
        else: pytest tests//structure tests//sequence

about:
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE.rst
  summary: A comprehensive library for computational molecular biology
  homepage: https://www.biotite-python.org/
  repository: https://github.com/biotite-dev/biotite
  documentation: https://www.biotite-python.org/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - t0mdavid-m
    - padix-key

about.summary: A comprehensive library for computational molecular biology
